name: Castle of Terror (CP Verlag)
overview: Short horror-themed platformer released in 1988. "You were caught in the "Castle of Terror". Try to find the exit by moving through each lineup to the next. This begins after you have reached the top of the screen. That sounds easy, but numerous ghosts, demons and other beings are not exactly helpful in finding the exit. As a little tip, we can tell you that the best thing to do is to avoid everything that moves." Published in Magic Disk 64 1988/11.
